title: Classic Brownies
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease a 9x9-inch baking pan or line with parchment paper.
In a medium saucepan, melt the butter over low heat. Remove from heat and stir in sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract.
Beat in cocoa powder, flour, salt, and baking powder until well combined.
Fold in chocolate chips if using.
Spread the batter evenly in the prepared pan.
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out with a few moist crumbs.
Allow to cool in the pan before cutting into squares.
